name: Element_valTest
description: Unit tests for the val() method in the Element class, specifically for textarea and non-textarea elements.

test_cases.name: testVal_textarea
test_cases.description: Tests the val() method for a textarea element, ensuring it returns the correct text value.

test_cases.name: testVal_nonTextarea
test_cases.description: Tests the val() method for a non-textarea element (input), ensuring it returns the correct attribute value.
